Definition: Does your household use this resource from nearby fallow lands, forest, woodland, shrubland, rivers, creeks, or other area?
During which season do you depend more on the resource?
How often do you collect the resource?
If you could no longer collect the resource would you be willing to purchase it at the market?
How much would you be willing to spend on the resource?
How has the availability of the resource changed over the past 5 years?
